chat_history.message:
Dear Backcare,

The package could be not delivered because the letter box is not accessible.

Please ask the customer to reschedule the delivery with the carrier.

Thank you.
Valérie DECAMPS

Hello,

My iPhone 12 is experiencing the following issue:

The package was not delivered to the billing address, but instead was left at a relay point under the pretext of our absence when I was actually present during the delivery. Then, once I retrieved the package at the relay point, I opened it and discovered an Ushuaia orchid shower gel from Mexico.

Thank you for your help,

Hello,
My iPhone 12 has the following problem:
The package arrived with a gel shower at the inside instead of the phone! They must have put an article of the same weight when packaging, I suppose; to deceive! Please refund us!
Thank you for your help,

Hello!

The customer claims that the parcel was delivered empty. We have requested the BM certificate of non-receipt, pictures of the package, picture of the label with tracking number visible, pictures of the package inside (with the product received inside if any) and police report.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 48 hours from reception of the documents

Best regards,
Paul - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We're working with our logistics partner to resolve this issue. They have requested the following documentation as well:

1. Photographs of all four sides of the parcel.
2. Photographs of all four sides of its contents.
3. A clearer picture of the shipping label on the parcel.
4. Handwritten CND including the IMEI.

Please also check if the customer left any comments on the delivery note.

Regards,
JY

Hi!

The package hasn't been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost package policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been provided by the customer and shared in this conversation.

 You can use the documents in the details to look into the matter with your delivery company

 We will allow 5 business days for you to complete the investigation with the shipping provider. After that, unless a fraud is detected, this order will be refunded.

This order will be refunded within 1 business day. 

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,
Bi Boti Didier Noel, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for submitting the relevant documents. We will get in contact with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer yet. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hi!

The package hasn't been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost package policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been provided by the customer and shared in this conversation.

You can use the documents in the details to look into the matter with your delivery company

We will allow 5 business days for you to complete the investigation with the shipping provider. After that, unless a fraud is detected, please send a tracking link for a replacement or this order will be refunded.

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 1 business day or this order will be refunded.

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,

Judicael, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the deadline.

Regards,
JH
